description: Students read and discuss Dostoevsky's major novels from Poor Folk through Brothers Karamazov. Russian majors may take an additional section in the Russian language for major credit in this course. Offered in alternate years. Prerequisite: BTS-T.
name: Dostoevsky-Tr
notes: Open only to juniors and seniors during web registration.
